prompts.name: Content Preservation Analysis
prompts.description: Comprehensive content analysis with strategic chunking for YouTube videos and other content, ensuring complete information preservation, systematic processing, and professional-grade content extraction that maintains context and meaning.

arguments.name: content
arguments.description: YouTube URL or other content to be comprehensively analyzed with strategic chunking and complete preservation

arguments.name: existing_content
arguments.description: Any existing content to preserve and integrate with new analysis

arguments.name: analysis_depth
arguments.description: Analysis depth: 'surface', 'standard', 'comprehensive', 'exhaustive' (default: comprehensive)

prompts.name: Layered Note Structure Creator
prompts.description: Creates sophisticated, multi-layered note structures with comprehensive analysis, professional presentation, rich formatting, and strategic knowledge integration that rivals industry-standard technical documentation.

arguments.name: analyzed_content
arguments.description: The analyzed content to structure with multi-layered professional presentation

arguments.name: vault_context
arguments.description: Current vault structure and organization for strategic integration

arguments.name: structure_type
arguments.description: Structure type: 'comprehensive', 'method_focused', 'reference_optimized', 'publication_ready' (default: comprehensive)

prompts.name: Vault Integration Optimizer
prompts.description: Creates comprehensive strategic integration between new notes and existing vault ecosystem, establishing sophisticated knowledge networks, professional cross-references, and industry-standard connections that enhance discoverability and career development value.

arguments.name: note_content
arguments.description: The note content to strategically integrate with existing vault ecosystem

arguments.name: vault_structure
arguments.description: Current vault structure and related content for strategic integration mapping

arguments.name: integration_level
arguments.description: Integration level: 'basic', 'standard', 'advanced', 'strategic_networking' (default: advanced)

prompts.name: Note Quality Assurance
prompts.description: Comprehensive quality assurance for professional-grade note content, ensuring publication-ready standards, technical accuracy, professional presentation, and strategic value that rivals industry documentation and educational resources.

arguments.name: note_content
arguments.description: The complete note content to evaluate for professional quality standards

arguments.name: original_source
arguments.description: Original source material for comparison and accuracy validation

arguments.name: quality_standards
arguments.description: Quality standards level: 'basic', 'professional', 'comprehensive', 'publication_ready' (default: comprehensive)

prompts.name: Smart Content Refinement
prompts.description: Transform raw content into sophisticated, publication-ready documentation with advanced Obsidian features, rich analysis, professional presentation, and comprehensive technical depth that rivals industry-standard documentation using strategic callout syntax.

arguments.name: raw_content
arguments.description: The raw content to transform into publication-ready, professional documentation

arguments.name: vault_context
arguments.description: Context about the vault structure and existing content for strategic integration

arguments.name: integration_level
arguments.description: Integration level: 'basic', 'standard', 'advanced', 'publication_ready' (default: advanced)

arguments.name: target_readability
arguments.description: Target readability: 'concise', 'balanced', 'comprehensive', 'publication_quality' (default: comprehensive)

prompts.name: Obsidian Metadata Optimizer
prompts.description: Creates comprehensive, intelligent metadata and frontmatter systems for professional-grade Obsidian notes, optimizing for discoverability, advanced plugin functionality, and strategic knowledge management with industry-standard tagging and classification.

arguments.name: note_content
arguments.description: The note content to analyze for comprehensive metadata creation

arguments.name: vault_structure
arguments.description: Current vault structure and organization for strategic metadata integration

arguments.name: metadata_depth
arguments.description: Metadata depth: 'essential', 'comprehensive', 'advanced', 'professional_grade' (default: advanced)

prompts.name: Format Enhancement Workflow
prompts.description: Transform basic markdown notes into comprehensive, publication-ready content with sophisticated formatting, rich callouts, comparison tables, and professional presentation standards that rival industry documentation using proper Obsidian callout syntax.

arguments.name: existing_content
arguments.description: The existing note content to transform into publication-ready, professional documentation

arguments.name: domain
arguments.description: Knowledge domain for contextual formatting (e.g., 'technical', 'creative', 'business')

arguments.name: enhancement_level
arguments.description: Enhancement intensity: 'comprehensive', 'publication_ready', 'industry_standard' (default: publication_ready)

prompts.name: Advanced Note Save Workflow
prompts.description: Comprehensive workflow that creates publication-ready notes with advanced Obsidian formatting, systematic plugin integration, and professional documentation standards

arguments.name: video_link
arguments.description: URL of the video (YouTube, etc.) or webpage to process

arguments.name: domain
arguments.description: Knowledge domain: art, fashion, cinematography, computer_science, ai_ml, personal_development (auto-detected if not provided)

arguments.name: formatting_level
arguments.description: Formatting intensity: basic, standard, comprehensive, showcase (default: comprehensive)

arguments.name: readability_priority
arguments.description: Content balance: concise, balanced, comprehensive (default: balanced)

arguments.name: plugin_integration
arguments.description: Obsidian plugin usage: minimal, standard, advanced, showcase (default: advanced)

prompts.name: Note Save Workflow
prompts.description: Optimized workflow that creates clean, readable notes while preserving valuable insights through smart content processing and intelligent refinement

arguments.name: video_link
arguments.description: URL of the video (YouTube, etc.) or webpage to process

arguments.name: note_style
arguments.description: Note style: 'concise' (clean, focused), 'balanced' (comprehensive but readable), 'reference' (detailed for lookup)

arguments.name: readability_priority
arguments.description: Readability priority: 'high' (very clean), 'balanced' (comprehensive but readable), 'comprehensive' (detailed reference)

prompts.name: Advanced Note Integration with Content Analysis Chain
prompts.description: Advanced workflow that processes YouTube videos and other content through comprehensive transcript analysis, strategic chunking, and content analysis chain to transform raw material into publication-ready, interconnected notes optimized for Obsidian knowledge management systems with strategic callout usage.

arguments.name: content
arguments.description: YouTube URL or other content to be comprehensively processed and integrated

arguments.name: existing_notes
arguments.description: Any existing notes to preserve and integrate with

arguments.name: vault_context
arguments.description: Context about the vault structure and existing content for strategic integration

arguments.name: domain
arguments.description: Knowledge domain for appropriate formatting strategy (e.g., 'creative_arts', 'technical', 'personal_development')

arguments.name: analysis_depth
arguments.description: Analysis depth: 'surface', 'standard', 'comprehensive', 'exhaustive' (default: comprehensive)

arguments.name: structure_type
arguments.description: Structure type: 'comprehensive', 'method_focused', 'reference_optimized' (default: comprehensive)

arguments.name: integration_level
arguments.description: Integration level: 'basic', 'standard', 'advanced', 'network_optimized' (default: advanced)

arguments.name: target_readability
arguments.description: Target readability: 'concise', 'balanced', 'comprehensive' (default: comprehensive)

arguments.name: metadata_depth
arguments.description: Metadata depth: 'essential', 'comprehensive', 'advanced', 'network_optimized' (default: advanced)

arguments.name: quality_standards
arguments.description: Quality standards: 'basic', 'professional', 'comprehensive', 'academic' (default: comprehensive)

arguments.name: enhancement_level
arguments.description: Enhancement intensity: 'standard', 'comprehensive', 'showcase' (default: comprehensive)

prompts.name: Vault Structure Analyzer
prompts.description: Analyzes vault structure to identify existing notes, MOCs, and connection opportunities for systematic integration. Provides real vault context for other workflow steps.

arguments.name: content_topic
arguments.description: The topic/domain of content to be integrated

arguments.name: vault_path
arguments.description: Root path to vault (default: current working directory)

prompts.name: Advanced Obsidian Note Refinement
prompts.description: Transform existing notes into publication-ready, professional documentation with sophisticated formatting, rich callouts, comparison tables, Mermaid diagrams, and comprehensive analysis that rivals industry-standard technical documentation.

arguments.name: existing_note
arguments.description: The existing note content to transform into publication-ready, professional documentation with advanced formatting and comprehensive analysis

prompts.name: Deep Vault Integration Workflow
prompts.description: Comprehensive workflow ensuring seamless deep integration of any content into the vault, preventing shallow placement and establishing strategic knowledge networks following S.P.A.R.C. methodology.

arguments.name: content
arguments.description: The content to be integrated into the vault with deep networking

arguments.name: vault_context
arguments.description: Current vault structure and existing content context

arguments.name: integration_level
arguments.description: Integration depth: basic, standard, advanced, network_optimized (default: network_optimized)

arguments.name: domain
arguments.description: Primary knowledge domain for content placement

arguments.name: quality_standards
arguments.description: Quality level: basic, professional, comprehensive, academic (default: comprehensive)

prompts.name: Obsidian Callout Mapping System
prompts.description: Comprehensive mapping system for applying proper Obsidian callout syntax based on content type, ensuring consistent and professional formatting throughout vault notes.

arguments.name: content
arguments.description: The content to analyze and map to appropriate Obsidian callout types
